title: Week 4 preview & Ravens vs. Steelers recap
itunes:title: Week 4 preview & Ravens vs. Steelers recap
description:
A room filled with heroes - Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler– are joined by NFL Medias Andrew Siciliano as they recap the Thursday Night Football game between the Ravens and the Steelers before wrapping the show previewing each Week 4 matchup.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
